snippet: Landon Donovan scored in the 74th minute to give the Los Angeles Galaxy a 1-1 tie with the host Chicago Fire.
abstract: Los Angeles Galaxy and Chicago Fire play to 1-1 draw; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Landon Donovan scored in the 74th minute to give the Los Angeles Galaxy a 1-1 tie with the host Chicago Fire.

headline.main: Galaxy Play Fire to a Draw
headline.print_headline: Galaxy Play Fire to a Draw
